name: A great 'pilot'
reviewBody: This series is a great idea. Canada's very own 'soap'set in the most beautiful city in Beautiful B.C. What an opportunity for Victoria Tourism. I had the privilege of attending the Premier of the two episodes. I was very impressed.The second episode left me wanting more. What is going to happen - I want to know.Please let there be further episodes. The writing is impressive as is the acting. 'Victoria' is absolutely great.(I am not related to her - I didn't even know her.)I was also pleased to see a 'Senior' involved. Hey, a love interest for 'Adele' is an idea - doesn't even have to be with another 'senior'! Adele is game for anything I think. My one and only criticism is the character Natasha. I couldn't make out who she was or what she was supposed to be doing. The fault of the actor? the writer? Me? This is a good show. I want it to 'fly'. Karen and co. are to be commended.
